mapper.select: SELECT r."id" FROM HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_REGISTRATION r JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER_INFO_CARD c ON r."patient_card_id" = c."id" WHERE c."user_id" = ${userId} AND "date" = TO_DATE('${date}') AND "dept_sub_id" = ${deptSubId} AND "payment_status" != 3 LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: UPSERT INTO HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_REGISTRATION( "id", "patient_card_id", "work_plan_id", "doctor_schedule_id", "doctor_id", "dept_sub_id", "date", "slot", "amount", "out_trade_no", "prepay_id", "payment_status", "create_time" ) VALUES( NEXT VALUE FOR HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_REGISTRATION_SEQUENCE, ${patientCardId}, ${workPlanId}, ${doctorScheduleId}, ${doctorId}, ${deptSubId}, TO_DATE('${date}'), ${slot}, ${amount}, #{outTradeNo}, #{prepayId}, 1, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPSERT INTO HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_REGISTRATION("id","payment_status") SELECT "id", 4 FROM HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_REGISTRATION WHERE "out_trade_no" = #{outTradeNo} AND "payment_status" = 1
mapper.select: SELECT "doctor_schedule_id" AS "doctorScheduleId", "work_plan_id" AS "workPlanId" FROM HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_REGISTRATION WHERE "out_trade_no" = #{outTradeNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_REGISTRATION r JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER_INFO_CARD c ON r."patient_card_id" = c."id" WHERE c."user_id" = ${userId}

SELECT r."id" AS "id", r."date" AS "date", r."slot" AS "slot", s."name" AS "name", s."location" AS "location", d."job" AS "job", r."out_trade_no" AS "outTradeNo", r."prepay_id" AS "prepayId", r."transaction_id" AS "transactionId", r."payment_status" AS "paymentStatus" FROM HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_REGISTRATION r JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER_INFO_CARD c ON r."patient_card_id" = c."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB s ON r."dept_sub_id" = s."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR d ON d."id" = r."doctor_id" WHERE c."user_id" = ${userId} ORDER BY r."date" DESC LIMIT ${length} OFFSET ${start}

SELECT u."open_id" AS "openId", TO_CHAR(r."amount", '###.##') AS "amount" FROM HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_REGISTRATION r JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER_INFO_CARD c ON r."patient_card_id" = c."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER u ON u."id" = c."user_id" WHERE r."id" = ${id} AND c."user_id" = ${userId}

SELECT r."id" AS "id", r."date" AS "date", r."slot" AS "slot", c."name" AS "patientName", s."name" AS "subDeptName", d."name" AS "doctorName", s."location" AS "location", d."job" AS "job", r."out_trade_no" AS "outTradeNo", TO_CHAR(r."amount", '###.00') AS "amount", r."payment_status" AS "paymentStatus", dp."id" AS "prescriptionId" FROM HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_REGISTRATION r JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER_INFO_CARD c ON r."patient_card_id" = c."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB s ON r."dept_sub_id" = s."id" JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR d ON d."id" = r."doctor_id" JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_PRESCRIPTION dp ON dp."registration_id" = r."id" WHERE r."id" = ${id} AND c."user_id" = ${userId}
